ComicInfo.Summary:
With 24 hours to find a missing man and save her village from extermination, Sheena must trespass deeper into the forest than she has ever gone before!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Mike McKone | 1 | B | Cover B | Rodney Buchemi | 2 | C | Cover C | Moritat & Andre Szymanowicz | 3 | D | Cosplay Cover D | Photo | 4 | E/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Moritat | 5 | F/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Rodney Buchemi | 6 | G/RI | 1:25 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Mike McKone | 7 | H/LE | Limited Edition Contest Variant Cover, Limited to 25 | Roberto Castro | 8 | I/LE | Limited Edition Contest "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover, Limited to 10 | Roberto Castro | 9 |
